channel.title: Please , I need Help
channel.description:
Ok A Few Things I Need To Know:
How to change player starting position. How to change where safe zones are. How to make npc shops and change what they say.
Please help, thanks!

item.title: Please , I need Help
item.dc:creator: @Jagex_Ltd Jagex Ltd©
item.description:
@Jagex_Ltd wrote:

Player start : go into player.java search for current starting coordinates , and change them to the coords of your new starting place.

Safe zones : Go into client.java and search for boolean nOnwild , and there you will see certain coordinates wich are safe zones.

Npc/Shops
To make shops , go into client.java search for wanneshop = 5 or any number
under it add:else if (NPCID == ####) { //replace #### with npc id PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; //shopid in shops.cfg }
Then into shops.cfg make a new line with something like

4 Shop 2 2 #### 100 #### 100

Read full topic

item.title: Please , I need Help
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

How to change player starting position

Find Player.java and look for the starting X Co-ord

How to change where safe zones are.
Go into client.java, press ctrl + f and type in “public boolean inwildy = false”
it follows the format “if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))”

How to make npc shops and change what they say
To make a shouter npc go into npchandler (i think).java and look for the word “moo”
its self explanitary from their

To make a shop, its one of those DIY or find a tut…if u want me to explain, i’ll need to made a vid for you to FULLY understand it.

Read full topic
